speaker: Alice
text: Good morning, everyone. I appreciate you joining this meeting on such short notice.

speaker: Bob
text: Good morning, Alice. Could you please outline the key objectives for today’s discussion?

speaker: Alice
text: Certainly. The agenda consists of three items: first, the progress update on the mobile app release; second, the budget allocation for Q4; and third, the hiring plan for the engineering team.

speaker: Clara
text: Regarding the mobile app, we have completed the beta testing phase. Early feedback indicates that the performance improvements were well received by our pilot users.

speaker: Daniel
text: That’s excellent news. Have we already identified the potential risks for the public launch scheduled next month?

speaker: Clara
text: Yes, the primary risks involve server scalability and customer support readiness. Both are being addressed with separate workstreams.

speaker: Bob
text: On the budget allocation, finance has approved an additional $200,000 to strengthen our infrastructure before the release.

speaker: Alice
text: That is reassuring. We must ensure that these funds are directed to the scalability initiatives Clara just mentioned.

speaker: Daniel
text: Lastly, regarding hiring, we are still short of two backend engineers. The recruiting team is expediting the process, but we may need to consider external contractors as a contingency plan.

speaker: Alice
text: Understood. Please prepare a detailed hiring forecast so we can evaluate both internal hires and external contractors in next week’s leadership meeting.

speaker: Bob
text: That covers all three agenda points. Should we proceed with summarizing the action items?

speaker: Alice
text: Yes. Clara will finalize risk mitigation on scalability, Bob will oversee the budget allocation, and Daniel will deliver the hiring forecast.

speaker: Clara
text: Confirmed. I will share my updates with the group by Friday.

speaker: Daniel
text: I will ensure the forecast is ready before next Wednesday.

speaker: Bob
text: Great. Thank you all for the productive discussion.
